email.subject: Pre-Invitation
email.body: That was amazing, i never thought that you could do these things so easily, your skills are amazing, and you can do so much with that. I present you with an invitation to a private team called Codex Connect, they only get the best people to do tasks. But before going in, you must create a pull request in our GitHub repository. You must store your name on variable in precodex.sh and show your name in terminal I will send you a note on how to do it. Good luck!

attachments.note: https://github.com/codex-connect-hacknet/pre-codex-inv Read the readme, add your name in precodex.sh bash script.
